Entries.Wizard_wizardNap: Greetings @,^^I must apologize for the state in which you found me the other day. On occasion I find my sleep plagued with dark dreams and I, childishly, resort to avoiding my bed. It shames me to know you witnessed such behavior from me. Nevertheless, I would like to say that I'm happy about the outcome. I managed to sleep more soundly than I have for several weeks.^If I can ever repay you, you have but to ask.^^ Sincerely,^ M. Rasmodia
Entries.Wizard_teachMagic: Greetings @,^^Many untold wonders are sheltered amongst the trees. Today, in particular, a strange energy stirs in the forest.^If you would like to learn heretofore unknown secrets, meet me in the hidden woods north of my tower.^^ Sincerely,^ M. Rasmodia
